description: Runs an SQL query on an Oracle Database and returns the results as a datatable.

input.name: connectionString
input.description: An Easy Connect string (e.g. hostname:port/service), a Connect Descriptor string, or the SID of a local Oracle Database instance. Defaults to `localhost:1521/XEPDB1`.

input.name: username
input.description: The database server username. Defaults to "root".

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
